Steam (ST): Jessica threw several cushions at her. But midway, she had an asthma attack and started to choke pretty badly.

PC Japanese (JP): 朱志香はたくさんあるクッションをぽこぽこと投げつけた。しかし途中から喘息の発作を起こしてしまい、苦しそうに咽込む。

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Jessica jogou várias almofadas nela.{n}Mas na metade, ela teve um ataque de asma e começou a tossir muito.

Umineko Project (UP): ".........Sha‐Shannon, it's about time for you, right? If you don't go soon, Genji‐san and Mom are gonna yell at you. I'm totally fine, so get going...! Heheh, sorry for crying like this. ......I'm such a moron."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ".........Sh, Shannon, it's about time, right? If you don't go quickly, Genji-san and Mom will get mad. I'm perfectly fine, so go quickly...! Heheh, sorry for crying like this. ......I'm such a moron."
PC Japanese (JP): 「………しゃ、紗音、もう時間だろ？　早く行かないとまた源次さんや母さんに怒られるぜ。私は全然平気だから早く行きなよ…！　へへ、悪ぃな、泣いちゃったりなんかしてさ。……馬鹿みてぇだぜ、私。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「………しゃ、紗音、もう時間だろ？　早く行かないとまた源次さんや母さんに怒られるぜ。私は全然平気だから早く行きなよ…！　へへ、悪ぃな、泣いちゃったりなんかしてさ。……馬鹿みてぇだぜ、私」
Russian (RU): ".........Ш‐Шаннон, уже ведь пора, верно? Если ты не поторопишься, Генджи‐сан и мама могут рассердиться. Я отлично себя чувствую, поэтому быстрее иди!.. Хе‐хе‐хе, извини за эти нюни. ......Я такая дура."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........Sha‐Shannon, já está na sua hora, não? Se você não for logo, o Genji‐san e a minha mãe vão gritar com você. Eu estou bem, então continue...! Heheh, desculpa por chorar assim. ......Eu sou uma imbecil."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………紗、紗音，已經到時間了吧？再不快點過去又會被源次和媽媽罵嘞。我一點事都沒有的，快去吧…！嘿嘿，抱歉啦，居然哭出來了。……好像笨蛋嘞。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………纱、纱音，已经到时间了吧？再不快点过去又会被源次和妈妈骂嘞。我一点事都没有的，快去吧…！嘿嘿，抱歉啦，居然哭出来了。……好像笨蛋嘞。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Sh-Shannon, è quasi ora, giusto? Se non vai velocemente, Genji-san e Mamma si arrabbieranno. Sto benissimo, quindi vai veloce...! Heheh, scusa per aver pianto in questo modo. ... Sono un'idiota."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "...S-Shannon, è quasi ora, no? Se non te ne vai in fretta, Genji-san e la mamma ti rimprovereranno di nuovo. Sto benissimo, quindi sbrigati...! Eheh, scusa, per aver pianto così... Mi sento un'idiota."
Turkish (TR): ".........Sha-Shannon, vaktin doldu, değil mi? Eğer hemen gitmezsen, Genji-san ve annem sana bağıracaklar. Ben gayet iyiyim, hadi git...! Heheh, böyle ağladığım için özür dilerim. ......Tam bir aptalım."

Steam (ST): Jessica faced away, acting as though she didn't really want to trouble Shannon, waving her hand as though chasing Shannon away.
Umineko Project (UP): Jessica faced away as if to show she wasn't looking for attention, and waved her hand as though to drive Shannon away.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Jessica faced away, acting as though she didn't really want to trouble Shannon, waving her hand as though driving Shannon away.
PC Japanese (JP): 朱志香は、構って欲しいわけじゃないというような仕草で背中を向けると、追い払うような感じで手をひらひらと振る。
Russian (RU): Джессика отвернула лицо, как будто она в самом деле не хотела беспокоить Шаннон, помахивая рукой, как бы отсылая её прочь.

PC Japanese (JP): 紗音は、それ以上しつこくされたくないという朱志香のサインを受け取ると、ぺこりと頭を下げ、退室していくのだった…。

Chinese Traditional (CHT): 紗音看到朱志香那示意著不想再受人過分關心的手勢後，便恭敬地低下頭，離開了房間…。

PC Japanese (JP): その足音が遠くへ消えていくと、朱志香はクッションを抱いたまま、そのままベッドに横たわる。

Russian (RU): "Разумеется, моя магия имеет мгновенный эффект. Возможно, ты чувствуешь, что ваша встреча была предопределена судьбой. Но это неверно. Не думай, что это может быть как‐то связано с судьбой."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "É óbvio, a minha magia é instantânea. ...Você pode até ter sentido como se seu encontro fosse um destino pré‐determinado. Mas tal coisa não é verdade. Não pense, nem por um momento, que isso possui relação com o destino."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「那是當然，妾身的魔法是立馬就奏效的。…也許汝會覺得，汝等二人相戀，簡直就像是早就已注定好了的命運一樣。但這麼想就錯了，汝可千萬不要以為這是命運。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「那是当然，妾身的魔法是立马就奏效的。…也许汝会觉得，汝等二人相恋，简直就像是早就已注定好了的命运一样。但这么想就错了，汝可千万不要以为这是命运。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Naturalmente, la mia magia è istantanea. Magari potresti pensare che il tuo incontro fosse voluto dal fato. Ma questo non è corretto, non credere che questo abbia niente a che vedere con il destino."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "È naturale, la mia magia è istantanea. Potresti credere che il vostro incontro possa essere stato un destino predeterminato. Tuttavia, sarebbe un'idea errata. Non provare nemmeno a pensare che il destino c'entri qualcosa."
Turkish (TR): "Doğal olarak; büyüm anlıktır. ...Buluşmanızın önceden belirlenmiş bir kader olduğunu düşünüyor olabilirsiniz. Ama bu doğru değil; bunun kaderle bir ilgisi olduğunu bir an bile düşünmeyin."

Steam (ST): First, that Shannon's relationship with George was a fate that'd be absolutely impossible under normal circumstances. ...Second, that the power of the witch was great enough to overturn that fact.
Umineko Project (UP): That originally, her relationship with George had been completely impossible.{n}......And that her magic power was so great, it could manipulate that fate.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Originally, her relationship with George had been completely impossible.......And the power of magic was so great that it could distort that.
PC Japanese (JP): 譲治との縁は、本来なら絶対にありえなかった運命。……そして、それを捻じ曲げるほどに、魔女の力が強大であると。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 譲治との縁は、本来なら絶対にありえなかった運命。{n}……そして、それを捻じ曲げるほどに、魔女の力が強大であると。
Russian (RU): Её отношения с Джорджем были совершенно невозможны с самого начала.{n}......И сила магии оказалась настолько велика, что смогла изменить это.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Que originalmente, a relação dela com George era completamente impossível.{n}......E que o poder mágico era tão grande que poderia manipular o destino.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 一為，她和讓治的緣分，本是絕不可能實現的命運。{n}……二為，魔女的力量強大到能彎曲這命運。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 一为，她和让治的缘分，本是绝不可能实现的命运。{n}……二为，魔女的力量强大到能弯曲这命运。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Originariamente, la sua relazione con George era stata completamente impossibile. ... E il potere della magia era così grande che la poteva distorcere.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Che originariamente, la relazione con George era un destino assolutamente impossibile...{n}E che i poteri della strega erano abbastanza forti da poter rovesciare quel fato.
Turkish (TR): Başlangıçta George'la olan ilişkisi tamamen imkansızdı.{n}......Ve büyülü gücü o kadar büyüktü ki, bu kaderi manipüle edebiliyordu.

Steam (ST): Shannon had just gotten wrapped up in those sweet days...and had started believing the illusion that all fate revolved around her.
Umineko Project (UP): Shannon had become swept up in these sweet days, and had started to fall under the illusion that all fate was revolving around her.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Shannon had just gotten wrapped up in those sweet days, and had started believing the illusion that all fate revolved around her.
PC Japanese (JP): 紗音は、ついつい甘い日々に浮かれ、全ての運命が自分を中心に回っていると錯覚してしまいそうになっていた。
Russian (RU): Шаннон просто погрузилась в эти сладкие дни и начала верить в иллюзию, будто судьба вращается вокруг неё.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Shannon tinha varrido esses doces dias, e começado a cair sob a ilusão que todo o destino girava em torno dela.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 紗音差點就因這段甜蜜的日子而變得飄飄然，錯以為一切的命運都在以自己為中心旋轉了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 纱音差点就因这段甜蜜的日子而变得飘飘然，错以为一切的命运都在以自己为中心旋转了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Shannon era stata appena avvolta da quei dolci giorni, così che iniziò a credere all'illusione del fato che girava intorno a lei.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Shannon si era fatta prendere così incautamente dalla delizia di quei giorni, che stava quasi per illudersi che tale destino girasse tutto intorno a lei...
Turkish (TR): Shannon bu tatlı günlere kendini kaptırmış ve tüm kaderin onun etrafında döndüğü yanılsamasına kapılmaya başlamıştı.

Speaker: {f:5:Beatrice}
Steam (ST): "...*cackle*cackle* Sorry, please forgive me. It's just like doctors. You cling to them when you're worried about your health, but after you're healed, you forget even to thank them. ...I've never been thanked as a witch, so I couldn't help acting a little rudely. Forgive me."
Umineko Project (UP): "...*cackle*cackle*, sorry, sorry. It's just like a doctor. Even though you rely on them when you worry about your health, after you're healed, you forget even to thank them. ......Witches have never known thanks, so I couldn't help acting a little rudely. Forgive me."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "...*cackle*cackle*, sorry, sorry. It's just like a doctor. Even though you rely on them when you worry about your health, after you're healed, you forget even to thank them. ......I've never been thanked as a witch, so I couldn't help acting a little rudely. Forgive me."
PC Japanese (JP): 「…くっくっくっく、すまぬすまぬ。医者と同じよ。病に悩めばすがるくせに、治れば感謝も忘れる。……魔女が感謝されたためしはないのでな、つい卑屈になってしまった。許すがいい。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…くっくっくっく、すまぬすまぬ。医者と同じよ。病に悩めばすがるくせに、治れば感謝も忘れる。……魔女が感謝されたためしはないのでな、つい卑屈になってしまった。許すがいい」
Russian (RU): "...Ха‐ха. Извини, извини. Это как с врачами. Хоть ты и надеешься на них, когда волнуешься за своё здоровье, но стоит только выздороветь, и ты забываешь даже поблагодарить их. ......Меня никогда не благодарили как ведьму, поэтому я не смогла удержаться от несколько грубого поведения. Прости меня."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "...*gargalhada*gargalhada*, desculpe‐me, desculpe‐me. É como um médico. Mesmo que você confie nele quando está preocupado com a sua saúde, depois que você é curado, esquece de agradecer a ele. ......As bruxas nunca conheceram um agradecimento, então eu não pude deixar de agir de forma ligeiramente rude. Perdoe‐me."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…呵呵呵呵，抱歉抱歉。這就同醫生一樣。因病煩惱時就纏住不放，治好了卻連感謝都忘了。……魔女從未被人感謝過，所以一不小心就變得低聲下氣起來了呢。請見諒。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…呵呵呵呵，抱歉抱歉。这就同医生一样。因病烦恼时就缠住不放，治好了却连感谢都忘了。……魔女从未被人感谢过，所以一不小心就变得低声下气起来了呢。请见谅。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... *cackle*cackle*, scusa, scusa. È proprio come un dottore. Sebbene ti fidi di loro quando ti preoccupi della tua salute, dopo che ti sei curato, ti dimentichi persino di ringraziarli. ... Non sono mai stata ringraziata come strega, quindi non posso far altro che agire un po' rudemente. Perdonami."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "...Mhmhmhmhmh, scusami, scusami. È proprio come per i dottori.{n}Quando temi di star male ti affidi a loro, ma quando ti senti meglio ti dimentichi persino di ringraziarli. Non è mai accaduto che una strega venisse ringraziata, quindi non ho potuto fare a meno di comportarmi male. Chiedo perdono."
Turkish (TR): "...*cackle*cackle*, üzgünüm, üzgünüm. Bu tıpkı doktorlar gibi. Sağlığınız için endişelendiğinizde onlara güveniyor olsanız da, iyileştikten sonra onlara teşekkür etmeyi bile unutursunuz. ......Cadılar asla teşekkür almadıklarından, biraz kaba davranmaktan kendimi alamadım. Beni affet."

Speaker: Shannon
Steam (ST): "......The gratitude I feel has never slipped my mind. ...It's thanks to your power that I was able to achieve happiness, {f:5:Beatrice}-sama. ...And without that power, the fate that brought me and George-sama together would never have happened. ...I have never forgotten that."
Umineko Project (UP): ".........I have never forgotten my feelings of gratitude. ...I was able to achieve happiness thanks to your power, {f:5:Beatrice}‐sama. ......And without that power, George‐sama and I would have had no fate together. ...I have never forgotten that."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ".........I have never forgotten my feelings of gratitude. ...I was able to achieve happiness thanks to your power, Beatrice-sama. ......And without that power, the fate that brought me and George-sama together wouldn't have happened. ...I have never forgotten that."
PC Japanese (JP): 「………感謝の気持ちを、忘れたことはありません。…ベアトリーチェさまのお力で幸せな思いができていること。……そして、そのお力がなければ、私と譲治さまが寄り添う運命がなかったこと、…決して忘れたことはありません。」

Russian (RU): ".........Я никогда не забываю о благодарности. ...Мне удалось добиться счастья благодаря вашему могуществу, {f:5:Беатриче}‐сама. .....И без этой силы той судьбы, что свела меня с Джорджем‐сама, не случилось бы. ...Я никогда не забуду этого."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........Eu nunca esqueci dos meus sentimentos de gratidão. ...Eu fui capaz de alcançar a felicidade graças ao seu poder, {f:5:Beatrice}‐sama. ......E sem esse poder, o George‐sama e eu não teríamos um destino juntos. ...Eu nunca esquecerei isso."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………感謝之情，我一刻都沒忘。…全靠貝阿朵莉切夫人的力量我才能感到這麼幸福。……還有，如果沒有這股力量，也就不會有我和讓治少爺相伴在一起的命運。…這些我都從未忘記過。」

E senza quel potere, il destino che ha portato me e George insieme non sarebbe arrivato. ... Non l'ho mai dimenticato."

E senza quel potere, il destino che ha reso me e George-sama più vicini non sarebbe mai esistito... Non l'ho affatto dimenticato."
Turkish (TR): ".........Minnettarlık duygularımı hiç unutmadım. ...{f:5:Beatrice}-sama, gücünüz sayesinde mutluluğa ulaşabildim. ......Ve o güç olmasaydı, George-sama ve benim birlikte bir kaderimiz olmazdı. ...Bunu asla unutmadım."

Speaker: {f:5:Beatrice}
Steam (ST): "Already, the one you care for is more than the object of one-sided love. You are a pair of lovers now. ...When two people are filled with love, nothing else is needed to establish a complete world. Perhaps you could call that a wonderful, ideal world. Heheheheheh! Even witches would be jealous."
Umineko Project (UP): "Already the person of your thoughts is no longer an object of one‐sided love. You are a pair of lovers now. ......To a pair filled with love, that alone is all they need in the world. A wonderful, ideal world, so to speak? Huhuhuhuhu! Even witches would be jealous."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Already the person of your thoughts is no longer an object of one-sided love. You are a pair of lovers now. ......To a pair filled with love, that alone is all they need in the world. Is this a wonderful, ideal world? Heheheheheh! Even witches would be jealous."
PC Japanese (JP): 「もはやそなたの想い人は一方的に想うだけの存在ではない。互いに想い想われる恋人同士よ。……愛に満たされた二人にとって世界はただそれだけで成立する。素晴らしき理想の世界かな。ふっふふふふふ！　魔女も妬こうというもの。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「もはやそなたの想い人は一方的に想うだけの存在ではない。互いに想い想われる恋人同士よ。……愛に満たされた二人にとって世界はただそれだけで成立する。素晴らしき理想の世界かな。ふっふふふふふ！　魔女も妬こうというもの」
Russian (RU): "Теперь человек твоих мыслей больше не объект односторонней любви. Отныне вы — влюблённая пара. ......Паре, разделяющей любовь, достаточно лишь её одной в этом мире. Замечательный ли, идеальный ли этот мир? Ха‐ха‐ха! Даже ведьмы могут позавидовать."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Certo, a pessoa que está em seus pensamentos não é mais apenas o objeto de um amor unilateral. Vocês são um casal apaixonado agora. ...Quando duas pessoas estão apaixonadas, nada mais é preciso para estabelecer um mundo completo. Talvez você possa chamar isso de um mundo ideal e maravilhoso. Huhuhuhuhu! Até as bruxas ficariam com ciúmes."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「現如今汝的戀慕之人，已不再只是汝單相思的對象了。汝等已是互念互愛著對方的戀人了。……對心中裝滿愛的兩人來說，世界僅憑此就可成立。那是個美妙而理想的世界吧。哼哼哼哼哼哼！連魔女都會嫉妒呢。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「现如今汝的恋慕之人，已不再只是汝单相思的对象了。汝等已是互念互爱着对方的恋人了。……对心中装满爱的两人来说，世界仅凭此就可成立。那是个美妙而理想的世界吧。哼哼哼哼哼哼！连魔女都会嫉妒呢。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "La persona dei tuoi pensieri non è più oggetto di un amore unilaterale. {n}Siete una coppia di amanti ora. ... Per una coppia piena di amore, quello è tutto ciò di cui hanno bisogno nel mondo. È un meraviglioso, mondo ideale? Heheheheheh! Anche le streghe sarebbero gelose."

Turkish (TR): "Düşüncelerindeki kişi artık tek taraflı bir aşkın ürünü değil. Artık iki aşıksınız. ......Sevgiyle dolu bir çift için, dünyada ihtiyaç duydukları tek şey bu. Belki de buna harika, ideal bir dünya diyebiliriz. Huhuhuhuhu! Cadılar bile kıskanabilir."

Steam (ST): {f:5:Beatrice} laughed pleasantly. That smile made her look as though she blessed the lovers' rendezvous from the bottom of her heart, without a trace of malice.
Umineko Project (UP): {f:5:Beatrice} laughed pleasantly.{n}That smile was without a trace of malice, making her look as though she blessed the lovers' secret meeting from the bottom of her heart.

PC Japanese (JP): ベアトリーチェは小気味よさそうに笑う。その笑顔に邪気はなく、恋人たちの甘い逢瀬を心から祝福しているように見えた。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ベアトリーチェは小気味よさそうに笑う。{n}その笑顔に邪気はなく、恋人たちの甘い逢瀬を心から祝福しているように見えた。

PC Japanese (JP): 恐ろしい力を持っているに違いない不思議な魔女が、まるでリスが胡桃を頬張るような音を立てながら、カリカリと次々お菓子を口にする仕草に、紗音はいつの間にか笑いを隠せなくなってしまっているのだった。

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Essa misteriosa bruxa, que certamente possui um terrível poder, estava devorando os doces um após o outro, fazendo um som similar ao de um esquilo estufando sua boca com nozes. Depois de um tempo, Shannon já não conseguia mais conter o riso.

Speaker: {f:5:Beatrice}
Steam (ST): "Hmmm. ...Love and roses are the same. Too much fertilizer causes the roots to rot. Some flowers cannot be raised without hard work. In that case, do as you wish. You may wear it or keep it in a box. That is my goodwill, given to you. Having you return it to me won't please me at all."
Umineko Project (UP): "Hmm. ......So love, too, is like a rose. Too much fertilizer causes the roots to rot. Some flowers cannot be raised without hard work. In that case, do as you wish. You may keep it in a box, rather than on your person. That is my goodwill, given to you. It would not please me to have it returned."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Hmmm. ......Love and roses are the same. Too much fertilizer causes the roots to rot. Some flowers cannot be raised without hard work. In that case, do as you wish. You may wear it or keep it in a box. That is my good will, given to you. It would not please me if you were to return it to me."
PC Japanese (JP): 「ふむ。……愛も薔薇と同じか。過ぎた施肥は根を腐らせる。苦労せねば育めぬ花もあろう。ならば好きにするが良い。身に着けず、宝石箱の中にしまうも良かろう。それはそなたに贈った妾の好意だ。それを返されては妾も愉快ではない。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「ふむ。……愛も薔薇と同じか。過ぎた施肥は根を腐らせる。苦労せねば育めぬ花もあろう。ならば好きにするが良い。身に着けず、宝石箱の中にしまうも良かろう。それはそなたに贈った妾の好意だ。それを返されては妾も愉快ではない」
Russian (RU): "Хм‐м. ......Любовь и розы — одно и тоже. Слишком много удобрений приводит к подгниванию корней. Некоторые цветы нельзя вырастить без напряжённой работы. В таком случае поступай как знаешь. Ты можешь носить её или хранить в коробочке. Это будет моей доброй волей, проявленной к тебе. Я не была бы рада, возврати ты её мне."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Sim. ......O amor também é como uma rosa. Fertilizante demais pode apodrecer as raízes. Algumas flores não podem crescer sem trabalho duro. Neste caso, faça como desejar. Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「嗯。……愛也與玫瑰一樣麼。施過多的肥反而會使根腐爛。也確是有些花，必須要靠辛勤的勞作去養育。那就隨汝喜歡吧。不帶在身上，收在珠寶箱中也不錯。這是妾身贈予汝的好意。要是它被還回來了，妾身也是不會感到愉快的。」

Steam (ST): "You may hold on to it and gain its benefits. Or you may keep it in a box. If you wish, you may even give it to another who is worrying about love. ...Or you could simply treasure it. Of course, it would pain my heart if you wasted it."
Umineko Project (UP): "You may hold on to it, and gain its benefits. You may also keep it in a box. If you wish, you are even free to give it to another who is worrying about love. ......But you should regard it as important. It would certainly pain my heart if you did not take care of it."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "You may hold on to it, and gain its benefits. You may also keep it in a box. If you wish, it is up to you whether you give it to another who is worrying about love. ......But you should regard it as important. Of course, it would pain my heart if you wasted it."
PC Japanese (JP): 「持ち続け、そのご利益を得るもよし。宝石箱にしまい込むもよし。望むなら、恋路に悩む別の者に譲ろうとそなたの勝手だ。……ただ大事にしてくれれば良い。さすがに粗末にされては心が痛むでな。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「持ち続け、そのご利益を得るもよし。宝石箱にしまい込むもよし。望むなら、恋路に悩む別の者に譲ろうとそなたの勝手だ。……ただ大事にしてくれれば良い。さすがに粗末にされては心が痛むでな」
Russian (RU): "Ты можешь держать её при себе и пользоваться её благами. Ты так же можешь хранить её в коробочке. Если пожелаешь, то можешь передать её кому‐нибудь другому, кто тоже переживает из‐за любви. ......Но ты не должна забывать, насколько она важна. Разумеется, меня бы ранило в самое сердце, растрать ты её силу впустую."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Você pode segurá‐lo com você, e obter seus benefícios. Você pode também guardá‐lo em um porta‐joias. Se desejar, você é livre para dá‐lo a outra pessoa que esteja preocupada com o amor. .....Mas você deve considerá‐lo importante. Certamente doeria em meu coração se você não cuidasse dele."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「繼續帶在身上，受它的保佑也好。把它收在珠寶箱中也行。倘若汝想要將之讓給其他為愛而苦惱的人，也隨汝。……只要汝珍惜它便是。畢竟它若是被胡亂處置，妾身是會心痛的。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「继续带在身上，受它的保佑也好。把它收在珠宝箱中也行。倘若汝想要将之让给其他为爱而苦恼的人，也随汝。……只要汝珍惜它便是。毕竟它若是被胡乱处置，妾身是会心痛的。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Puoi tenerlo, e ottenere i suoi benefici. Potresti anche tenerlo in una scatola. {n}Se lo desideri, puoi anche darla a un'altra persona preoccupata dall'amore. ... Ma dovresti considerarla un oggetto importante. Naturalmente, mi addolorerebbe il cuore se tu lo gettassi."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Puoi tenerla, e ottenere i suoi benefici. Potresti anche metterla in una custodia. Se lo vorrai, potrai anche darla ad un'altra persona turbata per amore...{n}Ma dovresti considerarla un oggetto importante. Naturalmente, mi si spezzerebbe il cuore se tu non te ne prendessi cura."
Turkish (TR): "Onu üzerinde tutabilir ve faydalarını görebilirsin. Ayrıca bir kutuda da muhafaza edebilirsin. Hatta dilersen, aşk konusunda endişelenen bir başkasına vermekte de özgürsün. ......Ama onu önemli olarak görmelisin. Eğer ona iyi bakmazsan kesinlikle kalbim incinir."

Steam (ST): According to {f:5:Beatrice}, she had appeared several times in the past in response to a person's summons, to give them some tool imbued with magical power.
Umineko Project (UP): According to {f:5:Beatrice}, she had appeared several times in the past in response to a person's summons so that she could give them an item imbued with some kind of magical power.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): According to Beatrice, she had appeared several times in the past in response to a person's summons so that she could give them a tool imbued with some kind of magical power.
PC Japanese (JP): ベアトリーチェが言うには、大昔から、人に請われて何かの魔力を込めた道具を与えるということは何度かあったらしい。
Russian (RU): Согласно рассказам {f:5:Беатриче}, несколько раз в далёком прошлом её призывали люди, которым она предоставляла предметы, наполненные определённой магической силой.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): De acordo com {f:5:Beatrice}, ela já apareceu diversas vezes no passado em resposta ao chamado das pessoas, para que ela pudesse dar‐lhes um item imbuído com algum tipo de poder mágico.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 據貝阿朵莉切所說，她似乎從很久以前開始，就曾多次因受人請求，而贈予過他們灌注著某種魔力的道具。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 据贝阿朵莉切所说，她似乎从很久以前开始，就曾多次因受人请求，而赠予过他们灌注着某种魔力的道具。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Secondo quello che Beatrice diceva, molte volte in passato, era stata chiamata dalle persone e aveva dato loro un oggetto infuso di una qualche energia magica.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Stando a quanto diceva {f:5:Beatrice}, molti anni or sono le fu chiesto per diverse volte di concedere un oggetto intriso di una qualche energia magica...
Turkish (TR): {f:5:Beatrice}'e göre, geçmişte birkaç kez bir kişinin çağrısına yanıt olarak ortaya çıkmış, böylece onlara bir tür büyülü güçle dolu bir eşya verebilmişti.

Steam (ST): ...However, when most people used that power to resolve their worries, they quickly grew unsettled by it, forgot their former gratitude, and threw away the tools they had been given with disgust.
Umineko Project (UP): ...However, most of them, after they used that power to resolve their worries, would quickly come to think of that power as creepy, and, forgetting their feelings of thanks, they would throw away the items they had been given with disgust.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...However, when most people used that power to resolve their worries, they quickly came to think of that power as creepy, and, forgetting their feelings of thanks, they threw the tools they had been given away with disgust.
PC Japanese (JP): …しかし、多くの人は、その力で悩み事を解決すると、今度はその力を不気味がるようになって、感謝の気持ちなど忘れて、授けた道具を忌み嫌い捨ててしまうのだという。
Russian (RU): ...Однако в то время, как большинство людей использовало эту силу для решения своих проблем, они быстро начинали воспринимать эту силу как жуткую, и, позабыв о благодарности, с отвращением выбрасывали предоставленные им волшебные предметы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Porém, a maioria delas, após usar o poder para resolver suas preocupações, rapidamente passou a pensar nesse poder como algo assustador e, esquecendo do sentimento de agradecimento, jogaram o item fora, com ojeriza.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …可是，大部分人用這力量解決掉他們自己的煩惱後，就會開始對這股力量感到畏懼，從而忘了感激之情，把得到的道具當成不吉利的東西扔掉。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …可是，大部分人用这力量解决掉他们自己的烦恼后，就会开始对这股力量感到畏惧，从而忘了感激之情，把得到的道具当成不吉利的东西扔掉。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... In ogni caso, quando la maggior parte delle persone usò quel potere per risolvere i loro problemi, arrivarono velocemente a pensare che quel potere fosse spaventoso, e, dimenticando ogni sentimento di gratitudine, buttavano via con disprezzo l'oggetto che gli era stato donato.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Tuttavia, quando la maggior parte delle persone usava quei poteri per risolvere i loro problemi, ne venivano turbati poco tempo dopo e, dimenticando ogni sentimento di gratitudine, gettavano via con disprezzo l'oggetto che gli era stato donato.
Turkish (TR): ...Ancak çoğu, bu gücü sıkıntılarını çözmek için kullandıktan sonra, kısa süre içinde bu gücün ürkütücü olduğunu düşünmeye başlar ve minnet duymayı unutarak kendilerine verilen eşyaları tiksintiyle çöpe atarlardı.

Speaker: {f:5:Beatrice}
Steam (ST): "So, it is quite rare for me to be thanked for my goodwill. ...In fact, this might even be the first time. *cackle*cackle*cackle*cackle*."
Umineko Project (UP): "Which is why I haven't often received thanks for my good will. ......Let's see, is this the first time? *cackle*cackle*cackle*cackle*."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "So I haven't often received thanks for my good will. ......Let's see, is this the first time? *cackle*cackle* *cackle*cackle*."
PC Japanese (JP): 「だから、妾の好意に素直に感謝されたためしは多くない。……いや、初めてか。くっくくくくくく。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「だから、妾の好意に素直に感謝されたためしは多くない。……いや、初めてか。くっくくくくくく」
Russian (RU): "Поэтому меня не так уж и часто благодарят за мою добрую волю. ......Давай‐ка посмотрим, первый ли это раз? Ху‐ху‐ху, ха‐ха‐ха‐ха."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "É por isso que muitas vezes eu não recebi agradecimentos pela minha boa vontade. ......Não, seria essa a primeira vez? *gargalhada*gargalhada*gargalhada*gargalhada*."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「所以，很少會有人老實感謝妾身的好意。……不，該說汝是第一個麼。呵呵呵呵呵呵呵。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「所以，很少会有人老实感谢妾身的好意。……不，该说汝是第一个么。呵呵呵呵呵呵呵。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Così non mi è capitato spesso di ricevere ringraziamenti per la mia buona volontà. ... Vediamo, è la prima volta questa? *cackle*cackle* *cackle*cackle*."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Perciò, non sono tante le volte in cui sono stata ringraziata con sincerità per la mia buona volontà... Anzi, forse questa è la prima. Mhmhmhmhmhmhmh."
Turkish (TR): "Bu yüzden iyi niyetim için pek sık teşekkür almadım. ......Aslında, bu ilk kez bile olabilir. *cackle*cackle*cackle*cackle*."

Steam (ST): The witch laughed heartily, but it looked like a sad laugh in Shannon's eyes.
Umineko Project (UP): The witch laughed heartily, but it looked like a sad laugh to Shannon's eyes.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The witch laughed heartily, but it looked like a sad laugh in Shannon's eyes.
PC Japanese (JP): 魔女は強気に笑うが、紗音はそれを見て、悲しい笑いに感じた。
Russian (RU): Ведьма от души смеялась, но в глазах Шаннон это был грустный смех.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A bruxa riu calorosamente, mas aos olhos de Shannon, parecia uma risada triste.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 魔女逞強的笑容，在紗音看來卻是充滿了悲傷。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 魔女逞强的笑容，在纱音看来却是充满了悲伤。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La strega rise di gusto, ma negli occhi di Shannon quella sembrava una triste risata.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): La strega rise di gusto, ma negli occhi di Shannon quella risata le sembrava triste.
Turkish (TR): Cadı içtenlikle güldü ama bu Shannon'un gözlerine hüzünlü bir kahkaha gibi göründü.

Steam (ST): She herself had been like that in the past...no, maybe she was still like that now.
Umineko Project (UP): She herself had been like that in the past—no, maybe she was still like that now.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She herself had been like that in the past, ...no, maybe she was still like that now.
PC Japanese (JP): かつての自分がそうであったように、…いや、今もまだそうかもしれない。
Russian (RU): Сама она была такой же в прошлом... Нет, возможно, она и теперь оставалась такой.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela mesma havia sido assim no passado — não, talvez ela ainda fosse assim agora.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 自己曾經也是如此，…不，或許即便現在也是一樣。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 自己曾经也是如此，…不，或许即便现在也是一样。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Lei stessa era stata così in passato... no, forse lei era così anche in quel momento.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Lei stessa era stata così in passato... anzi, forse era così anche tuttora.
Turkish (TR): Kendisi de geçmişte böyle olmuştu—hayır, belki de hâlâ böyleydi.

Steam (ST): {f:5:Beatrice} was definitely a witch, with a strange and terrifying power.
Umineko Project (UP): {f:5:Beatrice} was definitely a witch, with a strange and terrifying power.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Beatrice was definitely a witch, with a strange and terrifying power.
PC Japanese (JP): ベアトリーチェは間違いなく魔女であり、不思議な、恐ろしい力を持っている。
Russian (RU): {f:5:Беатриче} определённо была ведьмой, владеющей загадочной и пугающей силой.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): {f:5:Beatrice} definitivamente é uma bruxa, com um poder estranho e assustador.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 貝阿朵莉切是地地道道的魔女，擁有著不可思議的恐怖力量。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 贝阿朵莉切是地地道道的魔女，拥有着不可思议的恐怖力量。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Beatrice era senza dubbio una strega, con uno strano e terrificante potere.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): {f:5:Beatrice} era senza dubbio una strega, con dei misteriosi poteri terrificanti.
Turkish (TR): {f:5:Beatrice} kesinlikle garip ve korkunç bir güce sahip bir cadıydı.

Steam (ST): Most people probably wouldn't want to stick around her if they could help it.
Umineko Project (UP): Most likely, no one would go along with her if they could help it.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Most likely, no one would go along with her if they could help it.
PC Japanese (JP): できることなら付き合いなどしたくないと誰もが思うだろう。
Russian (RU): Скорее всего, никто не хотел бы ладить с ней, будь у них выбор.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mais precisamente, ninguém se relacionaria com ela se possível.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 想來無論是誰，都一定想要盡量不與她扯上關係吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 想来无论是谁，都一定想要尽量不与她扯上关系吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Molto probabilmente, nessuno le darebbe retta se potesse evitarlo.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Probabilmente nessuno, se avesse potuto, si sarebbe associato con lei.
Turkish (TR): Büyük olasılıkla, ellerinden gelse kimse onunla birlikte hareket etmezdi.

Steam (ST): Surely, even those who had relied on that strange power sometimes felt fear rather than gratitude as a result.
Umineko Project (UP): And even though on occasion they had relied on her strange power, it had undoubtedly resulted in fear more often than gratitude.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Surely, even though they had relied on that strange power, people sometimes felt fear rather than gratitude as a result.
PC Japanese (JP): 時に、その不思議な力に頼りながらも、その結果は感謝より畏怖の気持ちの方が大きかったに違いない。
Russian (RU): Конечно, даже при том, что они полагались на эту странную силу, в результате люди иногда вместо благодарности испытывали страх.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E, mesmo que na ocasião tivessem confiado em seu estranho poder, indubitavelmente o resultado era mais medo do que gratidão.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 就算有時要依靠她那不可思議的力量，到最後也肯定是畏懼之情遠遠大於感激之情。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 就算有时要依靠她那不可思议的力量，到最后也肯定是畏惧之情远远大于感激之情。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sicuramente, anche se contavano su quello strano potere, alcune volte le persone provavano paura invece che gratitudine.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Era indubbio che, come risultato, le persone provassero più paura che gratitudine, anche se si affidavano a quegli strani poteri...
Turkish (TR): Ve zaman zaman onun garip gücüne güvenmiş olsalar da, bu şüphesiz minnettarlıktan çok korkuyla sonuçlanmıştı.

Steam (ST): ...It must have deeply hurt the witch to have that happen over and over.
Umineko Project (UP): .........It must have deeply hurt the witch when that repeated over and over.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......It must have deeply hurt the witch when that repeated over and over.
PC Japanese (JP): ………そんな繰り返しがきっと、魔女を深く傷つけていったに違いない。
Russian (RU): ......Ведьму, должно быть, очень обижало, когда подобное повторялось множество раз.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): .........Isso deve ter machucado profundamente a bruxa sempre que ela repetia aquilo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ………如此一次次地重複下來，魔女的心無疑是受到了深深的傷害。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ………如此一次次地重复下来，魔女的心无疑是受到了深深的伤害。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Il fatto che questo si ripetesse ancora e ancora deve aver ferito molto profondamente la strega.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Il fatto che ciò fosse avvenuto più e più volte doveva aver ferito la strega nel profondo.
Turkish (TR): .........Bunun defalarca tekrarlanması cadıyı derinden yaralamış olmalıydı.

Steam (ST): Since the time she had started thinking that way, ...Shannon had tried to stop being frightened of {f:5:Beatrice}.
Umineko Project (UP): From the moment that she realized this, ...Shannon decided to stop being frightened of {f:5:Beatrice}.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Since the time she had started thinking that way, ...Shannon had tried to stop being frightened of Beatrice.
PC Japanese (JP): そう思った時から。…紗音はベアトリーチェのことを怖がるのをやめようと思った。
Russian (RU): С тех пор как она стала мыслить в подобном ключе, Шаннон пыталась перестать бояться {f:5:Беатриче}.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): No momento em que percebeu isso, ...Shannon decidiu parar de temer {f:5:Beatrice}.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 自從紗音想到了這一點。…她就下定決心，再也不去畏懼貝阿朵莉切了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 自从纱音想到了这一点。…她就下定决心，再也不去畏惧贝阿朵莉切了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sin dal momento in cui aveva cominciato a pensare in quella maniera... Shannon aveva provato a fermarsi dall'avere paura di Beatrice.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Dal momento in cui fece tali pensieri... Shannon provò a smettere di avere paura di {f:5:Beatrice}.
Turkish (TR): Shannon bunu fark ettiği andan itibaren, ...{f:5:Beatrice}'ten korkmayı bırakmaya karar verdi.

Steam (ST): This was surely something that had tormented the witch for over a thousand years...
Umineko Project (UP): That had surely tormented her for over a thousand years...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): That was surely what had tormented her for longer than one thousand years...
PC Japanese (JP): それはきっと、彼女を千年以上も苛んできたに違いないのだ…。
Russian (RU): Это наверняка было тем, что мучило её куда больше, чем тысяча лет...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Isso certamente a atormentou por mais de mil anos...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 人類的恐懼，一定已經折磨了她有上千年之久了…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 人类的恐惧，一定已经折磨了她有上千年之久了…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quello era sicuramente ciò che l'aveva tormentata per più di mille anni...
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Di sicuro era stato questo a tormentarla per più di mille anni...
Turkish (TR): Bu ona bin yıldan fazla bir süre işkence etmişti...

Steam (ST): Maybe she really liked those sweets. {f:5:Beatrice}, who normally spoke abusively, praised the black tea that Shannon served her and looked to be in remarkably high spirits.
Umineko Project (UP): Maybe she really liked the treats. {f:5:Beatrice}, who normally spoke abusively, praised the black tea that Shannon served her, and looked to be in remarkably high spirits.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Maybe she really liked the sweets. Beatrice, who normally spoke abusively, praised the black tea that Shannon served her, and looked to be in remarkably high spirits.
PC Japanese (JP): よほどお菓子を気に入ったのだろうか。普段、毒舌であることが多いはずのベアトリーチェは、紗音が淹れてくれた紅茶をべた褒めしながら、大変上機嫌に過ごすのだった。
Russian (RU): Возможно, ей в самом деле понравились сладости. {f:5:Беатриче}, обычно разговаривавшая оскорбительным тоном, похвалила чёрный чай, который Шаннон подала ей, и внешне была в очень приподнятом настроении.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Talvez ela realmente tenha gostado dos doces. {f:5:Beatrice}, que normalmente falava de forma abusiva, elogiou o chá preto que Shannon lhe serviu, e parecia estar muito animada.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 看來那糕點頗合她的口味吧。平時愛說挖苦話的貝阿朵莉切，此刻卻也在一個勁誇讚紗音沏給她的紅茶，顯得十分高興。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 看来那糕点颇合她的口味吧。平时爱说挖苦话的贝阿朵莉切，此刻却也在一个劲夸赞纱音沏给她的红茶，显得十分高兴。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Magari le piacevano davvero i dolci. Beatrice, che normalmente parlava in tono aggressivo, elogiò il tè nero che Shannon le aveva servito, e sembrava essere estremamente di buon umore.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Forse i dolci le piacevano davvero. {f:5:Beatrice}, che normalmente era abituata a parlare con toni irruenti, stava tessendo grandi elogi al tè nero che Shannon le aveva servito, e sembrava essere di umore molto allegro.
Turkish (TR): Belki de ikramları gerçekten seviyordu. Normalde aşağılayıcı bir şekilde konuşan {f:5:Beatrice}, Shannon'un kendisine ikram ettiği siyah çayı överken oldukça neşeli görünüyordu.

Steam (ST): After doing that for a while, the witch and the servant grew animated in their discussion of the trip with George.
Umineko Project (UP): On such terms, the witch and the servant grew animated talking about the trip with George.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): After doing that for a while, the witch and the servant grew animated talking about the trip with George.

Steam (ST): First off, she was a ghost-like being who appeared in unexpected places at unexpected times. And it seemed that not everyone could perceive that she was there.
Umineko Project (UP): First off, she was a ghost‐like being who appeared in unexpected places at unexpected times.{n}And it seemed that not everyone could perceive that she was there.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): First off, she was a ghost-like being who appeared in unexpected places at unexpected times. And it seemed that not everyone could perceive that she was there.
PC Japanese (JP): まず、彼女は幽霊のような存在で神出鬼没。そして誰にでも知覚できるわけではないらしい。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): まず、彼女は幽霊のような存在で神出鬼没。{n}そして誰にでも知覚できるわけではないらしい。
Russian (RU): Прежде всего, она была сущностью, похожей на призрака, которая появлялась в самых неожиданных местах и в самое неожиданное время.{n}И, похоже, что не каждый мог её увидеть.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Em primeiro lugar, ela era como um fantasma que aparecia em lugares inesperados e em horas inesperadas.{n}E parecia que não eram todos que podiam sentir sua presença.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 首先，她是猶如幽靈一般的存在，總是神出鬼沒。{n}而且好像也並不是所有人都能感覺到她。

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Innanzitutto, lei era un essere spettrale, come una sorta di fantasma.{n}Sembrava che non tutti potessero percepire la sua presenza.
Turkish (TR): Her şeyden önce, beklenmedik zamanlarda umulmadık yerlerde ortaya çıkan hayalet benzeri bir varlıktı.{n}Ve öyle görünüyordu ki onun orada olduğunu herkes algılayamıyordu.

Steam (ST): Apparently, everyone has something called a wavelength, and the ability to perceive witches varies greatly among different people.
Umineko Project (UP): It seemed that each person had something called a wavelength, and that there was a great amount of individual variation in people's ability to perceive the witch.

PC Japanese (JP): 何でも、人毎に波長のようなものがあり、魔女を知覚できるか否かについては激しい個人差があるのだという。

Chinese Traditional (CHT): 據她所說，每個人都有類似波長的東西，對於能不能感覺到魔女，人與人之間的差別是非常大的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 据她所说，每个人都有类似波长的东西，对于能不能感觉到魔女，人与人之间的差别是非常大的。

Steam (ST): From what {f:5:Beatrice} said, Krauss and his wife in particular had zero magical talent. And no matter how much she followed them around, they would never notice her.
Umineko Project (UP): From what {f:5:Beatrice} said, Krauss and his wife in particular had zero magical talent. And no matter how much she followed them around, they would never notice her.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): From what Beatrice said, Krauss and his wife in particular had zero magical talent. And no matter how much she followed them around, they would never notice her.
PC Japanese (JP): ベアトリーチェに言わせると、蔵臼夫婦は特に魔法の才能がゼロらしく、どんなにべたべたと纏わりついても、決して気付いてくれないのだという。
Russian (RU): Исходя из слов {f:5:Беатриче}, у Краусса и его жены в особенности не было ни малейшего магического таланта. И неважно, как долго она следовала за ними, они никогда не замечали её.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Pelo que {f:5:Beatrice} disse, Krauss e sua esposa tinham zero talento mágico. E não importa o quanto ela os seguisse, eles nunca iriam notá‐la.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 照貝阿朵莉切所說，特別是藏臼夫婦的魔法才能完全為零，無論怎麼一步不離地纏著他們，都完全不會被他們發覺。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 照贝阿朵莉切所说，特别是藏臼夫妇的魔法才能完全为零，无论怎么一步不离地缠着他们，都完全不会被他们发觉。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Secondo ciò che aveva detto Beatrice, soprattutto Krauss e sua moglie avevano talento zero nella magia. E non importava quanto li seguisse, loro non l'avrebbero mai notata.

Turkish (TR): {f:5:Beatrice}'in söylediğine göre, özellikle Krauss ve karısının hiç büyü kabiliyeti yoktu. Ve onları ne kadar takip ederse etsin, onu asla fark edemezlerdi.

Original Witch Hunt (OG): Previously, when Shannon had messed up and Natsuhi had gotten really mad at her, Beatrice had started playing around, hitting Natsuhi on the head with her pipe.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Anteriormente, quando Shannon fez coisas erradas e a Natsuhi ficou realmente irritada com ela, {f:5:Beatrice} começou a brincar em volta dela, acertando a cabeça de Natsuhi com seu cachimbo.

Steam (ST): ...I see, Natsuhi really doesn't notice a thing. But Shannon, watching that, had burst out laughing without thinking, and had gotten scolded even more.
Umineko Project (UP): ...Indeed, Natsuhi seems completely oblivious.{n}But Shannon, watching that, had burst out laughing without thinking, and had gotten scolded even more.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...I see, Natsuhi really hadn't noticed at all. But Shannon, watching that, had burst out laughing without thinking, and had gotten scolded even more.

Turkish (TR): ...Gerçekten de, Natsuhi tamamen bihaber görünüyordu.{n}Ama bunu seyreden Shannon hiç düşünmeden gülmeye başlamış ve daha da çok azar işitmişti.

Speaker: Shannon
Steam (ST): "Then...what about the Master? I hear he's been doing research in magic, so I'm sure he'll be able to notice you, {f:5:Beatrice}-sama."
Umineko Project (UP): "Then, ......what about the Master? I hear that he has been doing research in magic, so I'm sure he would be able to notice you, {f:5:Beatrice}‐sama."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Then, ......what about the Master? I hear that he has been doing research in magic, so I'm sure he would be able to notice you, Beatrice-sama."
PC Japanese (JP): 「なら、……お館様だったらどうでしょうか。魔法の研究とかをなさっているそうですし、きっとベアトリーチェさまのお姿にも気付いてくださると思います。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「なら、……お館様だったらどうでしょうか。魔法の研究とかをなさっているそうですし、きっとベアトリーチェさまのお姿にも気付いてくださると思います」
Russian (RU): "Тогда... Как насчет господина? Я слышала, что он занимался исследованиями в магии, поэтому я уверена, что он мог бы вас заметить, {f:5:Беатриче}‐сама."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Então, ......e quanto ao Mestre? Eu ouvi que ele está fazendo pesquisas sobre magia, então tenho certeza que ele é capaz de percebê‐la, {f:5:Beatrice}‐sama."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「那麼，……老爺又是如何呢？老爺好像有在做魔法這類的研究，我覺得他一定是能感知到貝阿朵莉切夫人的身姿的。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「那么，……老爷又是如何呢？老爷好像有在做魔法这类的研究，我觉得他一定是能感知到贝阿朵莉切夫人的身姿的。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Allora... che cosa mi dice del Padrone? Ho sentito che ha fatto ricerche di magia, quindi sono sicuro che sarebbe in grado di vederla, Beatrice-sama."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Allora... che cosa mi dice del padrone? Mi sembra che lui faccia ricerche sulla magia, quindi sono certa che sia in grado di accorgersi di lei, {f:5:Beatrice}‐sama."

Speaker: {f:5:Beatrice}

Steam (ST): "Indeed. ...Well, I only answered the summons on a whim. After all, in this period where magic has long been denied, here was a man who was without a scrap of talent, yet so desperate to succeed. I thought I'd drop by and poke some fun at him, and that's when my luck ran out. *cackle*cackle*cackle*."
Umineko Project (UP): "Mmhm. ......Well, I only answered the summons on a whim. In this period where magic has long been denied, there I saw a being, without a scrap of talent, giving it his all. It was just my luck that I'd decide to come and laugh at him. *cackle*cackle*cackle*."

PC Japanese (JP): 「うむ。……まぁ、召喚に応えたのは気まぐれだ。魔法を否定して久しいこのご時勢に、才能のカケラもない者が必死にやっているのでな。少しからかってやろうと思ったのが妾の運の尽きよ。くっくくくく。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「うむ。……まぁ、召喚に応えたのは気まぐれだ。魔法を否定して久しいこのご時勢に、才能のカケラもない者が必死にやっているのでな。少しからかってやろうと思ったのが妾の運の尽きよ。くっくくくく」
Russian (RU): "Хм‐м. ......Ну, я просто ответила на его призыв по собственной прихоти. В эту эпоху, когда магия была надолго забыта, бездари старались изо всех сил и даже сверх того. И до чего же мне повезло, что я спустилась посмеяться над ним. Ху‐ху‐ху‐ху."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Mmhm. ......Bem, eu apenas atendi à invocação dele por capricho. Nesta era onde a magia tem sido há muito tempo negada, foi quando eu vi aqui um homem, sem o menor talento, desesperado para ter sucesso em sua prática. Eu pensei em aparecer e me divertir com ele, mas foi então que a minha sorte fugiu. *gargalhada*gargalhada*gargalhada*."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「嗯。……不過，妾身應他召喚只是一時興起。在否定魔法時日已久的這個時代，竟還有沒半點才能的人類拚命進行魔法儀式。會想去稍稍戲弄他一下，也真是妾身的運氣走到頭了呢。呵呵呵呵呵。」

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Hmm. ... Beh, ho solo risposto all'evocazione per capriccio. Di questi tempi dove la magia è stata a lungo negata, quelli senza un briciolo di talento ce la mettono tutta. È stata solo la sua fortuna che mi ha fatto decidere di venire a ridergli in faccia. *cackle*cackle*cackle*."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Mmh... Beh, ho risposto alla sua chiamata per capriccio. In un'era come questa, dove la magia è stata ripudiata da tempo, sono quelli senza un pizzico di bravura a mettercela tutta. Pensare di prenderlo un po' in giro è stata la mia fine. Mhmhmhmhmh."

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Sim. Steam (ST): While everyone in the Ushiomiya family knew the story of how Kinzo idolized black magic, summoned a witch, and received the gold, in actuality, it was all rambling that no one believed in.
Umineko Project (UP): While everyone in the Ushiromiya family knew of the story that Kinzo had delved into sorcery, summoned a witch, and been given gold, in actuality, it was all rambling that no one believed in.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): While everyone in the Ushiomiya family knew of the story regarding how Kinzo had idolized black magic, summoned a witch, and been given gold, in actuality, it was all rambling that no one believed in.
PC Japanese (JP): 金蔵が魔術に傾倒し、魔女を呼び出して黄金を授かったという話は、右代宮家の誰もが知りながらも、実際は信じてない世迷言だ。
Russian (RU): Хотя все в семье Уширомия знали историю о том, как свято Кинзо веровал в тёмную магию, вызвал ведьму и получил золото, на деле же в это мало кто верил.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Enquanto todos na família Ushiromiya sabiam da história de que Kinzo havia mergulhado na feitiçaria, invocado uma bruxa, que lhe deu o ouro, na verdade eram tudo divagações nas quais ninguém acreditava.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 傾心於魔術的金藏召喚出了魔女，還得到了她授予的黃金。這是在右代宮家人人都知道，實際上卻人人都只當作胡言亂語的傳說。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 倾心于魔术的金藏召唤出了魔女，还得到了她授予的黄金。这是在右代宫家人人都知道，实际上却人人都只当作胡言乱语的传说。

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Sebbene tutti nella famiglia Ushiromiya conoscessero la storia per cui Kinzo si era dedicato alla magia nera e aveva evocato una strega da cui gli era stato conferito l'oro, in realtà per loro erano sciocchezze a cui non credevano.
Turkish (TR): Ushiromiya ailesindeki herkes Kinzo'nun büyücülükle uğraştığı, bir cadıyı çağırdığı ve kendisine altın verildiği hikayesini bilse de, gerçekte bunların hepsi kimsenin inanmadığı saçma sapan şeylerdi.

Steam (ST): And now, Shannon was having this story confirmed by the witch herself... She felt a little flustered by this incredible secret that only she knew.

Original Witch Hunt (OG): And now that she was hearing that it was true from the witch herself... Shannon felt a little flustered at this insane secret that only she knew.

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): それを、当の魔女が自ら真実だと語っているのだから…。{n}紗音は自分だけが知っているとんでもない秘密に、ちょっぴりと困惑を覚えるのだった。
Russian (RU): И теперь, когда она слышала об этом из уст самой ведьмы...{n}Шаннон стало немного не по себе от этой безумной тайны, ставшей известной лишь ей.

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): E ora, la strega in persona le stava dicendo che era tutto vero...{n}Shannon provò un po' di agitazione nel pensare a quel folle segreto, di cui solo lei ne era a conoscenza.
Turkish (TR): Ve şimdi cadının kendisi ona bunun doğru olduğunu söylüyordu...{n}Shannon sadece kendisinin bildiği bu çılgınca sır karşısında biraz telaşlandı.

Я привязана к этому месту на этом острове вот уже несколько десятилетий, не имея даже друга, с которым можно выпить чаю. ...Неважно, с кем я пытаюсь говорить, мой голос не доходит до них, и неважно, куда я пойду, я не могу ничего поделать. Вот такие скучные десятилетия."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......E graças a isso, eu estou neste estado. Eu estou nesta ilha entediante há décadas, sem uma única amiga para tomar chá comigo. ...Minha voz não alcança ninguém que eu chame, e eu não posso ir a lugar nenhum. Foram décadas realmente chatas."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……結果就落到了這般田地。連個一同飲茶的朋友都沒有，被鎖在這島上也已有幾十年了。…無論向誰搭話也沒人聽得到，就連想去哪都去不了。真是乏味的數十年啊。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……结果就落到了这般田地。连个一同饮茶的朋友都没有，被锁在这岛上也已有几十年了。…无论向谁搭话也没人听得到，就连想去哪都去不了。真是乏味的数十年啊。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... E grazie a quello, ora sono in questo stato. Sono rimasta isolata in questa isola per molti decenni, senza neanche un amico con cui bere il tè. ... Non importava con chi provassi a parlare, la mia voce non li raggiungeva, e non importava dove andassi, non potevo fare niente. Che decenni noiosi."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "E grazie a ciò, ora sono in questo stato. Sono rimasta imbrigliata in quest'isola per diversi decenni, senza neppure avere qualcuno con cui bere il tè...{n}La mia voce non raggiungeva nessuno a cui cercavo di rivolgermi, e non potevo andare da nessuna parte. Che decenni noiosi."
Turkish (TR): "......Ve onun sayesinde bu haldeyim. Onlarca yıldır bu adada birlikte çay içebileceğim bir arkadaşım bile olmadan yerimde sayıyorum. ...Sesim kimseye ulaşmıyor, hiçbir yere gidemiyorum. Ne sıkıcı dönemler."

Steam (ST): As she laughed in self-derision, she tapped her teacup with her finger. It made the light sound of pottery.
Umineko Project (UP): As she laughed in self‐derision, she tapped her teacup with her finger. It made the clear sound of porcelain.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): As she laughed in self-derision, she tapped her teacup with her finger. It made the transparent sound of pottery.
PC Japanese (JP): そう自嘲するように笑いながらティーカップを指で弾く。陶器の透き通った音がした。
Russian (RU): Иронично рассмеявшись, она постучала пальцем о свою чашку. Раздался ясный звук керамики.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Enquanto ela ria em autodepreciação, {f:5:Beatrice} bateu em sua xícara com seu dedo. Ela fez um claro som de porcelana.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 她一邊自嘲似的笑著，一邊用手指輕彈了下茶杯。陶器傳來了清澈的脆響。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 她一边自嘲似的笑着，一边用手指轻弹了下茶杯。陶器传来了清澈的脆响。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Come rise nel prendersi in giro da sola, lei diede un colpetto alla sua tazza da tè col dito. Produsse il delicato suono della ceramica.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Disse mentre rideva delle sue sventure, pichiettando col dito la sua tazzina.{n}Il suono prodotto dalla porcellana era limpido...
Turkish (TR): Kendini alaya alarak gülerken, parmağıyla çay fincanına dokundu. Bu porselenin belirgin sesini çıkardı.

Steam (ST): ...Shannon didn't know whether the word "self-derision" was really an accurate expression to describe the look on the witch's face.
Umineko Project (UP): ...Shannon didn't know whether the word "self‐derision" was really an accurate expression to describe the look on the witch's face.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...Shannon didn't know whether the word 'self-derision' was really an accurate expression to describe the look on the witch's face.
PC Japanese (JP): …その表情を自嘲と例えたが、それが果たして的確な表現かわからない。
Russian (RU): ...Шаннон не была уверена, является ли слово "самоирония" наиболее точным словом для описания выражения на лице ведьмы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Shannon não sabia se a palavra "autodepreciação" era mesmo uma expressão adequada para descrever a expressão facial da bruxa.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …雖說是用了自嘲來比喻她的表情，不過也不知這麼比喻究竟是否恰當。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …虽说是用了自嘲来比喻她的表情，不过也不知这么比喻究竟是否恰当。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Shannon non sapeva se la definizione ‘prendersi in giro da sola’ era davvero un modo accurato per descrivere l'espressione sulla faccia della strega.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Shannon vide dell'autoderisione in lei, ma non sapeva se fosse un termine davvero adeguato per descrivere la sua espressione.
Turkish (TR): ...Shannon, cadının yüzündeki ifadeyi tanımlamak için "kendini alaya almak" kelimesinin gerçekten doğru bir ifade olup olmadığını bilmiyordu.

Steam (ST): Shannon didn't understand everything, but she could more or less figure out the situation. ...And it was probably a topic that she couldn't press the witch on easily, not unless the witch started talking about it herself.
Umineko Project (UP): Shannon didn't understand everything, but she could more or less figure out the situation.{n}...And it was surely a topic that she should not press the witch on lightly, unless the witch started talking about it herself.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Shannon didn't understand everything, but she could more or less figure out the situation....And it was probably a topic that she could not press the witch on easily, unless the witch started talking about it herself.
PC Japanese (JP): 紗音に全てはわからないが、何となく事情を察する。…そしてそれは多分、彼女が自ら語らない限り、安易に促してはいけない話に違いない。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 紗音に全てはわからないが、何となく事情を察する。{n}…そしてそれは多分、彼女が自ら語らない限り、安易に促してはいけない話に違いない。
Russian (RU): Шаннон не до конца всё понимала, но более или менее разобралась в ситуации.{n}...И, похоже, что это была не та тема, которую ей следовало поднимать в разговоре с ведьмой, если только ведьма не решит сама поговорить об этом.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Shannon não entendia tudo, mas ela mais ou menos conseguia compreender a situação.{n}...E certamente não era um assunto no qual ela deveria pressionar a bruxa, a não ser que a bruxa começasse a falar de si mesma.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 紗音雖然並沒有搞清事情的全貌，但也多多少少想像到了其中的內情。{n}…而這多半是只要魔女不自己願意講述，就絕對不該隨隨便便地去催她說出來的事。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 纱音虽然并没有搞清事情的全貌，但也多多少少想象到了其中的内情。{n}…而这多半是只要魔女不自己愿意讲述，就绝对不该随随便便地去催她说出来的事。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Shannon non aveva capito tutto, ma poté più o meno farsi un'idea della situazione. ... Ed era probabilmente un argomento su cui poteva incalzare la strega così facilmente, a meno che lei stessa non iniziasse a parlarne.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Shannon non aveva compreso il quadro completo, ma potè grossomodo farsi un'idea della situazione...{n}E di certo non era un argomento su cui poteva incalzarla senza farsi problemi, a meno che non fosse lei stessa a parlarne.
Turkish (TR): Shannon her şeyi anlamıyordu ama durumu az çok çözebiliyordu.{n}...Ve bu konu, cadı kendisi bunun hakkında konuşmaya başlamadığı sürece, kesinlikle cadıya hafifçe baskı yapmaması gereken bir konuydu.

Steam (ST): To sum up everything she had said up until now...
Umineko Project (UP): To sum up everything she had said up until now...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): To sum up everything she had said up until now...
PC Japanese (JP): 彼女のこれまでを掻い摘めば。
Russian (RU): Если суммировать всё, что она сказала до этого момента...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Para resumir tudo o que ela disse até agora...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 把她至今為止所說的要點概括起來。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 把她至今为止所说的要点概括起来。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Per riassumere tutto quello che aveva detto fino a quel momento...
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Per riassumere quanto esposto finora...
Turkish (TR): Şu ana kadar söylediği her şeyi özetlemek gerekirse...

Steam (ST): {f:5:Beatrice}, who had been summoned by Kinzo's magic, could not leave this island for some reason. And she had lost her power and her form, living her days in boredom.
Umineko Project (UP): {f:5:Beatrice}, who had been summoned by Kinzo's magic, could not leave this island for some reason. And she had lost her power and her form, living her days in boredom.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Beatrice, who had been summoned by Kinzo's magic, could not leave this island for some reason. And she had lost her power and her form, living her days in boredom.
PC Japanese (JP): 金蔵の魔法によって呼び出されたベアトリーチェは、何らかの理由でこの島を離れられなくなったということだ。そして力も姿も失い、退屈な日々を過ごしてきた。
Russian (RU): {f:5:Беатриче}, призванная магией Кинзо, не может оставить этот остров в силу некоторых причин. И она потеряла свою силу и облик, проводя свои дни в скуке.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): {f:5:Beatrice}, que foi invocada pela magia de Kinzo, não podia deixar esta ilha por algum motivo. E ela perdeu seu poder e sua forma, vivendo seus dias em meio ao tédio.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 簡而言之就是，由金藏的魔法召喚出來的貝阿朵莉切，因不知什麼原因而無法離開這個島了。之後她盡失了力量與身姿，一直過著無聊乏味的日子。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 简而言之就是，由金藏的魔法召唤出来的贝阿朵莉切，因不知什么原因而无法离开这个岛了。之后她尽失了力量与身姿，一直过着无聊乏味的日子。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Beatrice, che era stata evocata dalla magia di Kinzo, non poteva lasciare quest'isola per qualche ragione. E aveva perso il suo potere e la sua forma, vivendo i suoi giorni con noia.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): {f:5:Beatrice}, che era stata evocata dalla magia di Kinzo, per qualche ragione non poteva lasciare l'isola. Inoltre, aveva perso i suoi poteri e la sua forma, trascorrendo i suoi giorni nel tedio.
Turkish (TR): Kinzo'nun büyüsüyle çağrılan {f:5:Beatrice}, bir sebepten dolayı bu adadan ayrılamıyordu. Gücünü ve bedenini kaybetmiş, günlerini can sıkıntısı içinde geçiriyordu.

Steam (ST): During that time, her words had reached Shannon, who never forgot to show sincere respect for the witch. And Shannon had helped the witch regain her power, if only a little bit.
Umineko Project (UP): During that time, her words had reached Shannon, who never forgot to strongly respect the witch. And she had made Shannon help her to regain her power, even if only a little bit of it.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): During that time, her words had reached Shannon, who never forgot to strongly respect the witch. And she had helped the witch to regain her power, if only a little bit.
PC Japanese (JP): そんな中、魔女に強い敬いを忘れない紗音に言葉が届いたのだ。そして、自分の力をわずかでも取り戻す手伝いをさせたのだ。
Russian (RU): За это время её слова достигли Шаннон, которая никогда не забывала с уважением относиться к ведьме. И она помогла ведьме вернуть свою силу, пусть и немного.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Durante esse tempo, suas palavras alcançaram Shannon, que nunca esqueceu de respeitar fortemente a bruxa. E ela fez com que Shannon a ajudasse a recuperar um pouco do seu poder, mesmo que só um pouco.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然後在某一天，不忘對魔女抱有深深敬意的紗音聽到了她的話語。於是為了能多多少少恢復一些力量，她便讓紗音幫起了自己的忙。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然后在某一天，不忘对魔女抱有深深敬意的纱音听到了她的话语。于是为了能多多少少恢复一些力量，她便让纱音帮起了自己的忙。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Durante quel periodo, le sue parole avevano raggiunto Shannon, che non aveva mai dimenticato di rispettare fortemente la strega. E lei aveva aiutato la strega a riottenere il suo potere, anche se solo di poco.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Durante tale periodo, le sue parole avevano raggiunto Shannon, la quale non aveva mai dimenticato di onorare la strega con diligenza. E lei l'aveva aiutata a riottenere i suoi poteri, anche se solo in parte...
Turkish (TR): Bu süre zarfında, sözleri cadıya büyük saygı duymayı asla unutmayan Shannon'a ulaşmıştı. Ve Shannon'un, az da olsa gücünü yeniden kazanmasına yardım etmesini sağlamıştı.

Umineko Project (UP): ...As a result, she had become able to drink tea with Shannon like this...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]

Russian (RU): ...В результате она даже смогла выпить чаю с Шаннон, как сейчас...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Como resultado, ela se tornou capaz de tomar chá com Shannon, assim como fazia agora...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …而結果，她至少能像這樣和紗音一起喝茶了…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …而结果，她至少能像这样和纱音一起喝茶了…。

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): E così facendo, divenne in grado di bere il tè con Shannon in quel modo...

Speaker: Shannon

Umineko Project (UP): "......{f:5:Beatrice}‐sama, what in the world was that mirror you told me to break?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......Beatrice-sama, what in the world was that mirror you told me to break?"

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "...{f:5:Beatrice}‐sama, che cosa diamine era quello specchio che mi ha detto di rompere?"

Speaker: {f:5:Beatrice}
Steam (ST): "Aaah, that. ......Long ago, it seems various things happened on the islands around this area. Because of that, malignant forces gathered here and began to draw in an evil distortion. It seems a traveling eastern magician or something built a shrine for the repose of souls and sealed them in there."
Umineko Project (UP): "Aaah, that topic. .........It seems that a lot of things happened on the islands around this area, in the distant past. Bad things gathered due to that, attracting bad distortions. It seems that a traveling Eastern mage or someone built a shrine for the repose of souls and sealed them in there."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Aaah, that story. .........Long ago, it seems various things happened on the islands around this area. Because of that, bad things gathered, drawn towards an evil distortion. It seems that a traveling eastern magician or something built a shrine for the repose of souls and sealed them in there."
PC Japanese (JP): 「あぁ、その話か。………この辺りの島で、大昔、色々とあったらしくてな。そのせいで良くないものが溜まり、悪い歪みを引き寄せていたのだ。それを、旅の東洋魔術師か何かが、鎮魂の社を建立して封じ込めたらしい。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「あぁ、その話か。………この辺りの島で、大昔、色々とあったらしくてな。そのせいで良くないものが溜まり、悪い歪みを引き寄せていたのだ。それを、旅の東洋魔術師か何かが、鎮魂の社を建立して封じ込めたらしい」
Russian (RU): "А‐а, та история. .........Давным‐давно, насколько можно судить, разные вещи происходили на островах в пределах этой области. Из‐за этого сюда стали стекаться различные злые сущности. Похоже, что странствующий восточный маг или кто‐то ещё построил храм за упокоение душ и запечатал их здесь."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Aaah, sobre isso. .........Parece que muitas coisas aconteceram nesta ilha perto desta área, em um passado distante. Coisas ruins se juntaram devido a isso, atraindo más distorções. Parece que um mago oriental viajante ou algo do tipo construiu um santuário para o repouso das almas e as selou nele."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「啊，汝說那個啊。………這一帶的島，在很久以前似乎有過不少變故。因此積聚了些不好的東西，招致了扭曲的邪念。之後好像是來了位雲游的東洋魔術師還是什麼的，建了個鎮魂之社將這些東西封在了裡面。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「啊，汝说那个啊。………这一带的岛，在很久以前似乎有过不少变故。因此积聚了些不好的东西，招致了扭曲的邪念。之后好像是来了位云游的东洋魔术师还是什么的，建了个镇魂之社将这些东西封在了里面。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Aaah, quella storia. Pare che molto tempo fa, nelle isole di questa zona ne siano successe di tutti i colori. Per quel motivo, cose cattive si radunarono, attirate verso una distorsione maligna. Pare che un mago orientale errante o qualcosa del genere costruì un tempio per il riposo delle anime e le avesse sigillate lì."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Aaah, quella storia... Pare che molto tempo fa, nelle isole di questa zona ne siano successe di tutti i colori. A causa di ciò si accumulò della malvagità, che attirò una distorsione maligna. Pare che un mago orientale errante, o qualcosa del genere, la sigillò, costruendo un tempio per il riposo delle anime..."
Turkish (TR): "Aaah, şu konu. .........Görünüşe göre uzak geçmişte bu bölgenin etrafındaki adalarda pek çok şey olmuş. Bu yüzden kötü şeyler toplanmış, kötü bozulmalar meydana gelmiş. Görünüşe göre gezgin bir Doğulu büyücü ya da birileri ruhların dinlenmesi için bir tapınak inşa etmiş ve onları oraya mühürlemiş."

Speaker: {f:5:Beatrice}
Steam (ST): "...That in itself has nothing to do with me, but unfortunately, that magical power rested on a different foundation than mine. It created a strong interference with my magic and was extremely bothersome."
Umineko Project (UP): "...That in itself had nothing to do with me, but unfortunately the foundation of that magical power was different. It created a strong interference with my own magic, and was extremely bothersome."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "...That in itself had nothing to do with me, but unfortunately the foundation of that magical power was different. It created a strong interference with my magical power, and was extremely bothersome."
PC Japanese (JP): 「…それ自体は妾とはどーでもいいことなのだが、困ったことに魔力の基礎が違っててな。妾の魔力にも強い干渉を及ぼしておって、非常に迷惑していたのだ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…それ自体は妾とはどーでもいいことなのだが、困ったことに魔力の基礎が違っててな。妾の魔力にも強い干渉を及ぼしておって、非常に迷惑していたのだ」
Russian (RU): "...Само по себе со мной это никак не связано, но, к сожалению, основа этой магической силы оказалась совершенно иной. Она оказала сильное вмешательство в мою волшебную силу и ставила мне палки в колеса."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "...Isso em si, não tem nada a ver comigo, mas infelizmente o fundamento desse poder mágico é diferente. Isso cria uma forte interferência com o meu poder mágico, e se torna um extremo incômodo."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…雖說此事本身對妾身來說根本無所謂，不過頭疼的是，那魔力的根基與妾身有所不同。而且它甚至對妾身的魔力起到了強烈的干擾，讓妾身非常為難。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…虽说此事本身对妾身来说根本无所谓，不过头疼的是，那魔力的根基与妾身有所不同。而且它甚至对妾身的魔力起到了强烈的干扰，让妾身非常为难。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Questa questione in sé non ha niente a che fare con me, ma sfortunatamente le fondamenta di quel potere magico erano diverse. Creò una forte interferenza col mio potere magico, e fu estremamente fastidioso."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "La cosa di per sé non mi riguardava, ma il problema era che la base di quel potere magico era di un'altra stoffa. Creò una forte interferenza col mio potere magico, e ciò fu estremamente seccante."
Turkish (TR): "...Bunun benimle hiçbir ilgisi yoktu ama ne yazık ki bu büyülü gücün temeli farklıydı. Benim büyümle güçlü bir etkileşime neden oluyordu ve son derece rahatsız ediciydi."

Speaker: Shannon
Steam (ST): "Is that how it was...? And I just assumed it existed only to seal you, {f:5:Beatrice}-sama..."

However, when they try to set the table, the area for the guest seating is in the Japanese style with Japanese style dishes.
PC Japanese (JP): ……料理に例えるならこうか。妾の注文した西洋料理が厨房でまさに料理されているとする。ところが、いざ配膳しようとしたら、客席は日本風で懐石料理が並べられている場だった。

Russian (RU): "......Если взять еду в качестве примера, то можно дать следующее объяснение. Предположим, на кухне готовят заказанную мною еду в западном стиле. Однако когда они будут накрывать на стол, там всё будет приспособлено для японской кухни."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Se eu for usar comida como exemplo, seria algo como isso. Vamos dizer que eu pedi algum prato ocidental, o qual está sendo preparada na cozinha. No entanto, quando chega a hora de servi‐lo, é feito ao estilo japonês, e os utensílios japoneses já foram postos à mesa."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……以料理來比喻的話，大概要這麼說吧。比方說廚房正在準備一盤妾身點的西洋料理。然而等到了上菜的時候，卻發現宴席是擺滿了懷石料理的日本風。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……以料理来比喻的话，大概要这么说吧。比方说厨房正在准备一盘妾身点的西洋料理。然而等到了上菜的时候，却发现宴席是摆满了怀石料理的日本风。」

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Se dovessi adoperare una metafora culinaria, userei questa: supponiamo che il cibo occidentale che avevo ordinato stia venendo preparato in cucina. Eppure, quando provano ad apparecchiare il tavolo, i posti per clienti sono in stile giapponese, con piatti tradizionali giapponesi."
Turkish (TR): "......Örnek olarak yemeği kullanacak olsaydım, belki şöyle bir şey olurdu. Diyelim ki Batı mutfağından bir yemek sipariş ettim ve bu yemek mutfakta hazırlanıyor. Ancak, servis zamanı geldiğinde, oturma düzeni Japon tarzında ve Japon sofra takımları yerleştirilmiş."

Speaker: Shannon
Steam (ST): "Nothing... I just thought your metaphor was pretty funny. I never would've thought to use a story about food as a metaphor for magic."

Speaker: Shannon
Steam (ST): "It's true that {f:5:Beatrice}-sama is different from humans. She has a terrifying power, so I think it's right for us to fear and respect her. ...Still, I think it's incredibly rude to despise her just because she isn't human."
Umineko Project (UP): "It's true that {f:5:Beatrice}‐sama is different from humans. She has a terrifying power, so I think she is to be feared and respected. ...But I think it's really rude to loathe her just for the single reason that she's different from a human."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "It's true that Beatrice-sama is different from humans. She has a terrifying power, so I think she is to be feared and respected. ...But just because she's different from a human, doesn't mean that it isn't really rude to loathe her like that."
PC Japanese (JP): 「確かにベアトリーチェさまは、人間とは違う。恐ろしい力を持っているし、恐れ敬わなければならない存在だと思う。…でも、人間とは違うからといって、それだけを理由に忌み嫌うのはとても失礼なことだと思うの。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「確かにベアトリーチェさまは、人間とは違う。恐ろしい力を持っているし、恐れ敬わなければならない存在だと思う。…でも、人間とは違うからといって、それだけを理由に忌み嫌うのはとても失礼なことだと思うの」
Russian (RU): "Это правда, что {f:5:Беатриче}‐сама отличается от людей. Она обладает пугающим могуществом, и я думаю, что она заслуживает того, чтобы её боялись и уважали. ...Но только то, что она отличается от людей, не означает, что можно вот так вот грубо к ней относиться."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "É verdade que a {f:5:Beatrice}‐sama é diferente dos humanos. Ela tem um poder terrível, então eu penso que ela deve ser temida e respeitada. ...Mas eu acho extremamente rude desrespeitá‐la apenas por ela ser diferente de um humano."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「確實貝阿朵莉切夫人和人類不一樣。她擁有恐怖的力量，而且我想，她也是個不得不去敬畏的存在。…但就算她與人類有所不同，我覺得僅僅以這個作為理由來厭惡她，也是非常失禮的行為。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「确实贝阿朵莉切夫人和人类不一样。她拥有恐怖的力量，而且我想，她也是个不得不去敬畏的存在。…但就算她与人类有所不同，我觉得仅仅以这个作为理由来厌恶她，也是非常失礼的行为。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "È vero che Beatrice-sama è diversa dagli esseri umani. Lei ha dei poteri terrificanti, quindi penso che debba essere temuta e rispettata. ... Ma solo perché lei è diversa da un essere umano, non vuol dire che non sia scortese odiarla in quel modo."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "È vero, {f:5:Beatrice}-sama è diversa dagli esseri umani. Ha dei poteri terrificanti, e credo che sia un'entità da temere e da rispettare... Ma trovo che sarebbe incredibilmente ingiusto disprezzarla solo perché è diversa dagli essere umani."
Turkish (TR): "{f:5:Beatrice}-sama'nın insanlardan farklı olduğu doğru. Korkunç bir gücü var, bu yüzden ondan korkulması ve saygı duyulması gerektiğini düşünüyorum. ...Ama sırf bir insandan farklı olduğu için ondan nefret etmenin çok kaba bir davranış olduğunu düşünüyorum."

Steam (ST): It was rare for Kinzo to leave his study. ...However, the fact that he had didn't mean his noble research had been suspended.

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Era raro che Kinzo uscisse dal suo studio...{n}Ciononostante, questo non voleva dire che avesse interrotto la sua nobile ricerca.

Steam (ST): He may have left the study because of a change in mood, but that didn't mean the thoughts filling his head were any different from those he had while inside the study.
Umineko Project (UP): He may have left the study for a change of mood, but the thoughts filling his head were no different from those he had inside the study.

Steam (ST): Kanon knew that no matter what the time, speaking to Kinzo when he didn't want to be spoken to would always disturb his research.

Steam (ST): As Kanon listened to his master's weeping voice with his back turned, he turned around just once.
Umineko Project (UP): As Kanon listened to his master's weeping voice over his shoulder, he turned around just once.

PC Japanese (JP): 嘉音は咄嗟に、魔女が何か良からぬ陰謀で金蔵に害を為そうとしているに違いないと考え、急ぎ金蔵の元へ駆け戻り、自らを楯にしようと思った。
